properties.name: allowMultipleSelections
properties.summary: Set to true to allow the user to select multiple items from the library.

properties.name: animated
properties.summary: Boolean if the dialog should be animated when showing and hiding.

properties.name: autohide
properties.summary: Specifies that the library should be hidden automatically after media selection is completed.

properties.name: cancel
properties.summary: Function to call if the user presses the cancel button.

properties.name: error
properties.summary: Function to call upon receiving an error.

properties.name: mediaTypes
properties.summary: An array of media type constants defining selectable media.
properties.description:
Specify one or more of the MUSIC_MEDIA_TYPE constants from Titanium.Media. To specify multiple types, either pass an array of values, or pass a single value that represents the bitwise-OR of the desired media types. For example, the following values are equivalent:

mediaTypes: [Titanium.Media.MUSIC_MEDIA_TYPE_MUSIC, Titanium.Media.MUSIC_MEDIA_TYPE_PODCAST]

Or:

mediaTypes: Titanium.Media.MUSIC_MEDIA_TYPE_MUSIC|Titanium.Media.MUSIC_MEDIA_TYPE_PODCAST

properties.name: success
properties.summary: Function to call when the music library selection is made.
